Location.Name: Malaysia
Location.Address: Microsoft Malaysia Office, Level 18, Menara Shell, 221, Jalan Tun Sambathan Kuala Lumpur

Organizers.Name: Vincent Choy
Organizers.Description: Vincent is a MVP for Office365 in Malaysia. He has been featured in BFM, Malay Mail Online, SMB Magazine, The Edge and Nanyang Siang Pao, giving his views on Microsoft Cloud. He is also a Certified Yammer Professional. Vincent also mentors IT-Resellers in their journey to cloud.

Organizers.Name: Senthamil Selvan
Organizers.Description: Microsoft Windows Dev MVP. Have experience in developing apps for windows platform. Developed several UWP apps and currently working on HoloLens apps.

Organizers.Name: Rico Ho
Organizers.Description: Rico Ho is the founder and developer of Webparts360, a low code applications development tool for SharePoint and Office 365. Being a Lotus Notes compete specialist, he has empowered many large companies IT teams to migrate thousands of business applications to SharePoint/Office 365. He has presented at 17 international conferences, sharing practical advice on workflow best practices and customer case studies.

Sessions.Title: Registration
Opening and Key Note
Transforming your organization into a Digital Workplace

Speaker.Name: Vignesh Ganesan
Speaker.Description: Vignesh Ganesan is a SharePoint and Office 365 Technical Manager holding 7.8 years of experience in various technologies such as SharePoint Server, Office 365 , Windows 10 and Cloud Security  . He's a big fan of Microsoft Cloud technologies and mainly focuses on Digital Transformation.As an IT professional Vignesh is part of several professional communities, speaks & organizes technical events and writes articles on a variety of subjects on his personal blog and other websites and magazines.

Sessions.Title: Delivering tangible business value with Office 365

Speaker.Name: Rico Ho
Speaker.Description: Rico Ho is the founder and developer of Webparts360, a low code applications development tool for SharePoint and Office 365. Being a Lotus Notes compete specialist, he has empowered many large companies IT teams to migrate thousands of business applications to SharePoint/Office 365. He has presented at 17 international conferences, sharing practical advice on workflow best practices and customer case studies.

Sessions.Title: Accelerate success and time-to-value for Microsoft 365 with best practices from the field

Speaker.Name: Patrick Guimonet
Speaker.Description: Patrick is both a MVP and RD. He has a 20+ years’ experience as Enterprise Solutions Architect. He has a successful track record of technical expertise for Office 365, SharePoint, SQL Server and Oracle RDBMS. He is a former Microsoft employee in France. He has been working for his own company Abalon, specialized on SharePoint and Office 365 for 7+ years.

Sessions.Title: Lunch
The 4th Dimensional Meeting

Speaker.Name: James Ooi
Speaker.Description: As a past MVP award winner for many years, James has 12 years’ experience working with Microsoft Core Infrastructure solutions, both On-Prem & Cloud Services.

Sessions.Title: Bots - Changing the way we engage with technology

Speaker.Name: Kirti Prajapati
Speaker.Description: As a Consultant Kirti works with clients to develop and deploy comprehensive solutions on SharePoint and Office 365. As an active community member, Kirti is associated with several professional communities, speaks and organizes Microsoft sponsored events in India and organizing free technical workshops on SharePoint and Office 365. Kirti writes his personal blog and he believes that Knowledge is power and sharing knowledge is empowering!

Sessions.Title: All about documents in O365 and SharePoint

Speaker.Name: Sebastien Paulet
Speaker.Description: Office Server and Services Microsoft MVP. 12 years as consultant, dev, tech lead, project manager, trainer, team leader, speaker around SharePoint/ O365 technologies, Scrum methodology and fond of topics around #documentation, #archiving, #lean, #scrum, #lowcode, #roi, #ergonomy and #rgpd.

A Deep Dive into Microsoft 365 Security

Speaker.Name: Muditha Chathuranga
Speaker.Description: Muditha is a Technical Consultant working for Infront Consulting Group who brings years of experiences in different business domains in IT. At Infront Consulting Group, he primarily focuses on cloud-based enterprise collaboration and information security using Microsoft technologies such as Office 365, EM+S, and Azure. His expertise expands beyond Microsoft realm and he's also experienced in many Open Source technologies as well.

Sessions.Title: Single Sign On and Multi Factor Authentication with Azure AD

Speaker.Name: Abdul Rasheed Feroz Khan
Speaker.Description: Rasheed is a Microsoft MVP on Azure from CodeSizzler who has worked with a number of MNCs.  He has a good command of Azure and emerging technologies.

Sessions.Title: Data Leakage Prevention and Rights Management in Office365

Speaker.Name: Kay Suet Yee
Speaker.Description: Sabrina specializes on Microsoft Office 365 security, network security, Advanced Threat Protection and other security related technologies.

Sessions.Title: Lunch
Migrating to SharePoint Online - Real-life Experiences

Speaker.Name: Rene Modery
Speaker.Description: Rene is a Microsoft Office Servers and Services MVP, working as a Solutions Architect (SharePoint, Office 365, Azure, AWS) in Singapore. For more than 10 years, Rene has lived and worked in Europe and Asia Pacific. The main focus of his work lies on SharePoint, Office 365, and Azure. He is generally interested in helping companies get more value out of their SharePoint and cloud investments.

Sessions.Title: How your SharePoint deployment can benefit from Azure capabilities

Speaker.Name: Manoj V Karunarathne
Speaker.Description: Manoj is a passionate IT Professional who has over 9 years of experience in Microsoft technology stack mainly in SharePoint, Windows Server and Office 365. He has experienced 4 generations of SharePoint. Being a MVP under Office Servers and Services category, he is very passionate about community works. Actively engaged in volunteer speaking events in Sri Lanka, Singapore, USA and the president, organizer and a speaker of Brunei Cloud user Group.

Sessions.Title: IOT for Beginners and IT Pros

Speaker.Name: Kishore Chowdary
Speaker.Description: Kishore Chowdary is an International speaker who is also a Lead Training Associate in CodeSizzler. Kishore Chowdary is a part of C-Sharp Corner community where he shares his knowledge via articles and videos. He also speaks in local tech groups and he is also a part of Microsoft Azure Vidyapeeth in which he handles technical webinars for techies across the globe.

Speaker.Name: Sylver SCHORGEN
Speaker.Description: Sylver is an Office 365 and SharePoint consultant in New Caledonia. He is Cloud and Datacenter MVP and love to script and automate everything he does. He is the cofounder of the 'Microsoft Afterwork Noumea' in New Caledonia (with another MVP, Julien CHABLE) where he speaks about SharePoint, Office 365 and PowerShell automation. He writes articles on multiple subjects related to SharePoint, Office 365 and Powershell on his personal blog.

Speaker.Description: Malin De Silva is an Azure Solutions Consultant with experience on Azure, SharePoint and Office 365. Malin has spoken at different conferences and technical events within Sri Lanka and abroad. Also a blogger and a developer who has strong competency at hackathons.

Sessions.Title: Microsoft Graph: Get the power of Excel functions into your Web Applications

Speaker.Name: Fiqri Ismail
Speaker.Description: Fiqri is an Architect and Development Technologies MVP for 12 consecutive years. He authored the book '.NET Standard 2.0 Cookbook'. He is also a community leader, speaks at the Sri Lanka Developer Forum and writes articles on a variety of subjects on his personal blog.
